author: iSazonov
body:
<!-- Anything that looks like this is a comment and can't be seen after the Pull Request is created. -->

# PR Summary

<!-- Summarize your PR between here and the checklist. -->

## PR Context

Related #9570

Remove unneeded code related to workflows.

## PR Checklist

- [x] [PR has a meaningful title](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---submission)
    - Use the present tense and imperative mood when describing your changes
- [x] [Summarized changes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---submission)
- [x] [Make sure all `.h`, `.cpp`, `.cs`, `.ps1` and `.psm1` files have the correct copyright header](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---submission)
- [x] This PR is ready to merge and is not [Work in Progress](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---work-in-progress).
    - If the PR is work in progress, please add the prefix `WIP:` or `[ WIP ]` to the beginning of the title (the `WIP` bot will keep its status check at `Pending` while the prefix is present) and remove the prefix when the PR is ready.
- **[Breaking changes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#making-breaking-changes)**
    - [x] None
    - **OR**
    - [ ] [Experimental feature(s) needed](https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs/blob/staging/reference/6/Microsoft.PowerShell.Core/About/about_Experimental_Features.md)
        - [ ] Experimental feature name(s): <!-- Experimental feature name(s) here -->
- **User-facing changes**
    - [x] Not Applicable
    - **OR**
    - [ ] [Documentation needed](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---submission)
        - [ ] Issue filed: <!-- Number/link of that issue here -->
- **Testing - New and feature**
    - [ ] N/A or can only be tested interactively
    - **OR**
    - [x] [Make sure you've added a new test if existing tests do not effectively test the code changed](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#before-submitting)

comments.author: PoshChan
comments.body:
@iSazonov, your last commit had 4 failures in `PowerShell-CI-windows`
Workflow .Xaml module is not supported in PSCore.Import a XAML file directly should raise a 'NotSupported' error
```powershell
Expected an exception, with FullyQualifiedErrorId 'Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand' to be thrown, but the FullyQualifiedErrorId was 'Modules_InvalidModuleExtension,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand'. from D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\Import-Module.Tests.ps1:323 char:11
    +         { Import-Module $xamlFile -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw ...
    +           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\Import-Module.Tests.ps1: line 323
323:         { Import-Module $xamlFile -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw -ErrorId "Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand"
```
Workflow .Xaml module is not supported in PSCore.Import a module with XAML root module should raise a 'NotSupported' error
```powershell
Expected an exception, with FullyQualifiedErrorId 'Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand' to be thrown, but no exception was thrown.
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\Import-Module.Tests.ps1: line 327
327:         { Import-Module $xamlRootModule -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw -ErrorId "Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand"
```
Workflow .Xaml module is not supported in PSCore.Import a module with XAML nested module should raise a 'NotSupported' error
```powershell
Expected an exception, with FullyQualifiedErrorId 'Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand' to be thrown, but the FullyQualifiedErrorId was 'Modules_InvalidModuleExtension,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand'. from D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\Import-Module.Tests.ps1:331 char:11
    +         { Import-Module $xamlNestedModule -ErrorAction Stop } | Shoul ...
    +           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\Import-Module.Tests.ps1: line 331
331:         { Import-Module $xamlNestedModule -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw -ErrorId "Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand"
```
Test-ModuleManifest tests.module manifest containing valid processed empty rootmodule file type fails: foo.xaml
```powershell
Expected an exception, with FullyQualifiedErrorId 'Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.TestModuleManifestCommand' to be thrown, but the FullyQualifiedErrorId was 'Modules_InvalidRootModuleInModuleManifest,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.TestModuleManifestCommand'. from D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\engine\Module\TestModuleManifest.Tests.ps1:92 char:11
    +         { Test-ModuleManifest -Path $testModulePath -ErrorAction Stop ...
    +           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\engine\Module\TestModuleManifest.Tests.ps1: line 92
92:         { Test-ModuleManifest -Path $testModulePath -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw -ErrorId "$error,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.TestModuleManifestCommand"
```

comments.author: PoshChan
comments.body:
@iSazonov, your last commit had 4 failures in `PowerShell-CI-linux`
Clean up open Runspaces when exit powershell process.PowerShell process should not freeze at exit
```powershell
Expected $true, but got $false.
at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/powershell/engine/Api/BasicEngine.Tests.ps1: line 53
53:         Wait-UntilTrue -sb { $process.HasExited } -TimeoutInMilliseconds 5000 -IntervalInMilliseconds 1000 | Should -BeTrue
```
Workflow .Xaml module is not supported in PSCore.Import a XAML file directly should raise a 'NotSupported' error
```powershell
Expected an exception, with FullyQualifiedErrorId 'Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand' to be thrown, but the FullyQualifiedErrorId was 'Modules_InvalidModuleExtension,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand'. from /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Core/Import-Module.Tests.ps1:323 char:11
    +         { Import-Module $xamlFile -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw ...
    +           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Core/Import-Module.Tests.ps1: line 323
323:         { Import-Module $xamlFile -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw -ErrorId "Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand"
```
Workflow .Xaml module is not supported in PSCore.Import a module with XAML root module should raise a 'NotSupported' error
```powershell
Expected an exception, with FullyQualifiedErrorId 'Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand' to be thrown, but the FullyQualifiedErrorId was 'System.NullReferenceException,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand'. from /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Core/Import-Module.Tests.ps1:327 char:11
    +         { Import-Module $xamlRootModule -ErrorAction Stop } | Should  ...
    +           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Core/Import-Module.Tests.ps1: line 327
327:         { Import-Module $xamlRootModule -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw -ErrorId "Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand"
```
Workflow .Xaml module is not supported in PSCore.Import a module with XAML nested module should raise a 'NotSupported' error
```powershell
Expected an exception, with FullyQualifiedErrorId 'Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand' to be thrown, but the FullyQualifiedErrorId was 'Modules_InvalidModuleExtension,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand'. from /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Core/Import-Module.Tests.ps1:331 char:11
    +         { Import-Module $xamlNestedModule -ErrorAction Stop } | Shoul ...
    +           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Core/Import-Module.Tests.ps1: line 331
331:         { Import-Module $xamlNestedModule -ErrorAction Stop } | Should -Throw -ErrorId "Modules_WorkflowModuleNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.ImportModuleCommand"
```
